mapper.select: SELECT /*PersonalUpdateProductMapper.searchRecentFromPkgNm, searchRecentFromPkgNm, 오승민/인크로스, 2014-02-28 */ LA.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ NO_EXPAND LEADING(CMDEVICE SC DEVICE APPPROD) USE_NL(SC DEVICE APPPROD) */ SC.PROD_ID , SC.APK_PKG_NM , SC.APK_VER , SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID , NVL(AUP.PRIORITY, 0) AS PRIORITY ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SC.APK_PKG_NM ORDER BY SC.APK_VER DESC) AS RNUM FROM TB_DP_APP_PROD APPPROD ,TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DEVICE ,TB_CM_DEVICE CMDEVICE ,TB_DP_APP_UPGRD_POLICY AUP WHERE SC.APK_PKG_NM IN #{v} SC.APK_PKG_HASH IN#{v} AND APPPROD.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND SC.PROD_ID = DEVICE.PROD_ID AND SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = DEVICE.SUB_CONTENTS_ID AND DEVICE.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND DEVICE.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CMDEVICE.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND (APPPROD.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = #{parentClsfCd} or APPPROD.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD is null) AND CMDEVICE.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AUP.TENANT_ID(+) = #{tenantId} AND AUP.PROD_ID(+) = APPPROD.PROD_ID AND AUP.POLICY_CLSF_CD(+) = 'DP012502' /* DP012502 : 우선순위 지정 업데이트 */ AND AUP.USE_YN(+) = 'Y' ) LA WHERE RNUM = 1

SELECT /*PersonalUpdateProductMapper.searchPidByHashedPkg, 정희원, 2015-03-02 */ /*+ NO_EXPAND ORDERED USE_NL(P) */ TP.PROD_ID, TP.MAPG_APK_PKG_NM AS APK_PKG_NM, P.LAST_DEPLOY_DT FROM TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD P ON P.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TP.MAPG_APK_PKG_HASH IN #{v}

SELECT count(*) as CNT FROM (SELECT tdtp.prod_id FROM TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TDTP WHERE 1=1 and tdtp.tenant_id in #{v} and tdtp.prod_id = #{prodId} and MAPG_APK_PKG_NM is not null group by tdtp.prod_id, tdtp.mapg_apk_pkg_hash)

SELECT /*PersonalUpdateProductMapper.searchUpdateList, 정희원, 2015-03-02 */ SPRT.PROD_ID, SC.APK_PKG_NM, SC.APK_VER, SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID FROM TB_CM_DEVICE DEV INNER JOIN TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SPRT ON SPRT.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = DEV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD INNER JOIN TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC ON SC.PROD_ID = SPRT.PROD_ID AND SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = SPRT.SUB_CONTENTS_ID WHERE 1=1 AND SPRT.PROD_ID in #{v} AND DEV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND DEV.USE_YN='Y'
